summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of PetTrust Bogotá platform. Backend: 31/31 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All critical flows working - Homepage, Explore, Login, Owner Dashboard, Provider Dashboard, Safety Center, Walker/Daycare profiles, Registration. Wompi payments are MOCKED (sandbox mode).

minor.issue: Returns 404 if value unchanged (modified_count=0), should return 200 with current state
Linting: 8 issues - variable 'status' redefined multiple times, unused variable 'booking' on line 867

issues: ESLint warnings: useEffect missing dependencies in multiple components
Nested component definitions in Explore.js and calendar.jsx causing potential performance issues

action_items: MINOR: Fix backend linting issues - rename 'status' variable to avoid redefinition conflicts
MINOR: Fix unused 'booking' variable on line 867 in server.py
MINOR: Fix React useEffect dependency warnings in frontend components
MINOR: Move WalkerCard and DaycareCard components outside Explore component to avoid re-renders
critical_code_review_comments: Backend: Variable 'status' is redefined multiple times in Pydantic models (lines 200, 279, 329, 338, 360, 418) - should use different field names
Frontend: Nested component definitions in Explore.js (WalkerCard, DaycareCard) cause unnecessary re-renders - should be moved outside
Frontend: Multiple useEffect hooks missing dependencies - could cause stale closure bugs
seed_data_creation: Demo data already seeded: 3 walkers, 2 daycares, 1 pet (Max), 1 confirmed booking with payment

mocked_apis.Wompi payments: MOCKED - /api/payments/wompi/* endpoints simulate sandbox mode, not real payment processing

features_tested.registration: ✓ New user registration with role selection - working
features_tested.walker_profile: ✓ Profile with certifications, gallery, booking button - working
features_tested.daycare_profile: ✓ Profile with amenities, cameras, booking button - working
features_tested.owner_dashboard: ✓ Bookings list, pets tab, safety center - working
features_tested.provider_dashboard: ✓ Inbox with 5 pending requests, capacity slider, active toggle - working
features_tested.add_pet: ✓ Modal form with all fields - working
features_tested.safety_center: ✓ SOS button, PIN verification, emergency contacts, share trip - working
features_tested.wompi_payments: ✓ MOCKED - Create and confirm transactions - working

context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend tests in /app/tests/test_pettrust_api.py cover 31 endpoints. Minor linting issues in backend (variable redefinition) and frontend (useEffect dependencies). Wompi payments are MOCKED - not real integration. GPS tracking is simulated.
